verses.name: 1 Kings 4:27
verses.text: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:28
verses.text: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:29
verses.text: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:30
verses.text: And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.
